other.text: They believed umbrellas were 14 for women.
English explorers found out that Indian princes also carried umbrellas on the east coast of North America.
The umbrella is not a new invention.
It 16 that people in different parts of the world invented umbrellas at different times.
England has a rainy climate, and umbrellas are very useful there.

definition.zh_def: 傘，一種用於遮擋雨水或陽光的可攜式裝置，通常由布料和金屬或塑料支架組成。
definition.en_def: A portable device used for protection against rain or sunlight, typically consisting of a fabric canopy supported by a folding frame.
definition.example: She opened her umbrella to shield herself from the rain.
